creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM
text:
With latest nightly builds, HttpServletRequest.getSession(true) is always
returning a new HttpSession object even if there is a session already
established between the client and container.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I have modified the SessionExample in the Servlet example webapp (and will
commit that change later today), and it works fine for me. If it still doesn't
work for you, please attach a test webapp or send more info.
